Uses of Package
org.apache.datasketches.hll

  • Packages that use org.apache.datasketches.hll 
    Package Description
    org.apache.datasketches.hll
    The DataSketches™ HLL sketch family package HllSketch and Union are the public facing classes of this high performance implementation of Phillipe Flajolet's HyperLogLog algorithm[1] but with significantly improved error behavior and important features that can be essential for large production systems that must handle massive data.
  • Classes in org.apache.datasketches.hll used by org.apache.datasketches.hll 
    Class and Description
    HllSketch
    The HllSketch is actually a collection of compact implementations of Phillipe Flajoletâ€™s HyperLogLog (HLL) sketch but with significantly improved error behavior and excellent speed performance.
    TgtHllType
    Specifies the target type of HLL sketch to be created.
    Union
    This performs union operations for all HllSketches.
